item.title: Collaboration Network
item.description: Map of the collaboration networo updated to xxxx

Hi there, I’m a Ph.D. student in Astronomy at the University of Padova and I am an active member of the GALFOR research group. I earned both my Physics Bachelor degree and my Astronomy Master degree at the university of Padova, where I’m currently doing my Ph.D. My research focuses on the study of Star clusters in the Milky Way and in the Magellanic Clouds, and I investigate different features of these puzzling and fascinating objects.
